articles.author: Shikhar Balwani, Andre Janse Van Vuuren
articles.title: Asia Set for Cautious Open Ahead of Busy Data Week: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Global stocks and bonds started December under pressure as a renewed selloff in cryptocurrencies and hawkish comments from the Bank of Japan weighed on sentiment.
articles.content:
Global stocks and bonds started December under pressure as a renewed selloff in cryptocurrencies and hawkish comments from the Bank of Japan weighed on sentiment.
